messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

oracle fusion issue missing receipts sent november fusion issue receipts hi one submitted expense claim attached receipts however when look report fusion if click into each expense line can receipt there can open but also tells receipt approve expense report but fusion seems be very confusing some erroneous displays cheers production manager editorial consultant en

I'm leaning toward either "Storage" or "Purchase," but I'm still weighing the precise category.

The other categories, "Hardware," "HR Support," and "Access," are clearly unrelated. My final choice is "Miscellaneous."

My final selection is "Miscellaneous".
